imdb.plot outline: "Conscious Love Stories" is a fun and enlightening web series starring the best role models you'll ever meet for how to have a loving, joyous relationship. Each episode features bestselling authors Kathlyn and Gay Hendricks ("Conscious Loving", "Conscious Loving Ever After", "The Big Leap") sharing engaging and impactful stories to help singles and couples alike discover true love and create conscious, lasting relationships. Beyond the laughs and lessons in the stories themselves, the joy, love and playfulness of Gay and Katie's interactions on the show offer a truly delightful example of what a rich and conscious romantic relationship can be. Unique among relationship experts, Gay and Katie have been working, teaching and loving together for more than 35 years. They have worked with more than 20,000 individuals and 4,000 couples, and through their books, seminars, courses and apps have helped millions more make the inner shifts needed to attract their soulmates and create conscious, lasting relationships. Gay and Katie have coauthored ten books, including "Conscious Loving," "The Conscious Heart," "Lasting Love" and their most recent, "Conscious Loving Ever After." Gay has also written numerous bestsellers on his own, including "The Big Leap," Five Wishes" and "The First Rule of Ten". Together they have appeared on OPRAH, CNN and CNBC, among hundreds of other television and radio shows.
imdb.title: Conscious Love Stories
plot: In this fun and enlightening web series, bestselling authors Kathlyn and Gay Hendricks ("Conscious Loving") share engaging and impactful stories to help singles and couples discover true love and create conscious, lasting relationships.

"_Conscious Love Stories_ (qv)" is a fun and enlightening web series starring the best role models you'll ever meet for how to have a loving, joyous relationship. Each episode features bestselling authors Kathlyn and Gay Hendricks ("Conscious Loving", "Conscious Loving Ever After", "The Big Leap") sharing engaging and impactful stories to help singles and couples alike discover true love and create conscious, lasting relationships. Beyond the laughs and lessons in the stories themselves, the joy, love and playfulness of Gay and Katie's interactions on the show offer a truly delightful example of what a rich and conscious romantic relationship can be. Unique among relationship experts, Gay and Katie have been working, teaching and loving together for more than 35 years. They have worked with more than 20,000 individuals and 4,000 couples, and through their books, seminars, courses and apps have helped millions more make the inner shifts needed to attract their soulmates and create conscious, lasting relationships. Gay and Katie have coauthored ten books, including "Conscious Loving," "The Conscious Heart," "Lasting Love" and their most recent, "Conscious Loving Ever After." Gay has also written numerous bestsellers on his own, including "The Big Leap," Five Wishes" and "The First Rule of Ten". Together they have appeared on OPRAH, CNN and CNBC, among hundreds of other television and radio shows.
